---
title: Getting started
---

Contracts that work on EVM-compatible blockchains should work on Arthera with minimal or no changes.

You can use your preferred EVM tools and libraries to start developing on Arthera:

- [**Hardhat**](./using-hardhat)
- [**Foundry**](https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry)
- [**Truffle**](https://trufflesuite.com/)
- [**Alchemy**](https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/alchemy-sdk-quickstart)
- [**Remix**](https://remix.ethereum.org/)

Arthera is also fully compatible with [**OpenZeppelin**](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/4.x/) libraries.

### Arthera Testnet network info

- **RPC Endpoint: `https://rpc-test2.arthera.net`**
- **WebSocket Endpoint (Optional): `wss://ws-test.arthera.net`**
- **Chain ID: `10243`**

[**View on Chainlist.org**](https://chainlist.org/chain/10243)

### Wallet

You can create a wallet and manage your subscriptions [there](https://wallet-test.arthera.net/login).

:::info

_Latest update: [October 17, 2023](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs)_

:::
